attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This 'lame duck' administration cannot go on. It has no mandate to lead us out of this turmoil and is directionless, unable to take appropriate action as it will not be in power in a short while.  Stop this and call an election now.  Let the people speak, and let us start to move forward with the fresh approach we need.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
